items.sentence: Don\'t worry about it. Everything\'s going to be fine.
I expected to make new friends when I moved to Boston.
I found it difficult to understand what he was saying.
I found it rather difficult to make myself understood.
I had hardly opened my mouth, when she interrupted me.
Which wire should I cut, the red one or the white one?
You should try to make the most of your opportunities.
Your uncle and I have known each other for many years.
Tom never told me he didn\'t know how to speak French.
Tom often acts like a baby when he can\'t get his way.
